---
title: LLM-Extraction Project - Baseline Characteristics Table
---

## Load packages
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
library(tidyverse)
library(REDCapR)
library(tinytable)
library(MedOnko)
```

## Load Data

```{r}
data <- redcap_read(
    redcap_uri = Sys.getenv("redcap_fxdb_url"),
    token = Sys.getenv("llm_radio_api"),
    raw_or_label = "label"
  )$data
```

## Use IDs to download baseline data

```{r}
data_ids <- data |> 
  mutate(
    # extract any number before the | character
    pat_id = as.numeric(str_extract(ier_bk, "[0-9]+$"))
  ) |> 
    select(pat_id) |> 
    distinct()

MedOnko::get_birth(24986782)
```
